content: In which popular TV series did characters live on a spaceship named Serenity?

The popular TV series where characters live on a spaceship named Serenity is called "Firefly." It was created by Joss Whedon and aired on the Fox network from 2002 to 2003. The show follows the adventures of Captain Malcolm Reynolds and his crew as they navigate through space, encountering various challenges and conflicts. Although the series was canceled after only one season, it gained a dedicated fan base and later led to the production of a feature film called "Serenity."
